scripts.dev: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:client
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.clean: node -e "import('fs').then(fs => { fs.rmSync('dist', {recursive: true, force: true}); fs.readdirSync('public').filter(f => !['index.html','styles.css'].includes(f)).forEach(f => fs.rmSync('public/' + f, {recursive: true, force: true})); fs.readdirSync('.').filter(f => f.endsWith('.tsbuildinfo')).forEach(f => fs.rmSync(f, {force: true})); })"
